Package edu.ou.cs2334.project4.models

Class NonogramMakerModel

java.lang.Object
edu.ou.cs2334.project4.models.NonogramMakerModel
public class NonogramMakerModel extends Object
This class contains the functionality of the puzzle maker that is independent of the graphical interface. t encapsulates a one-dimensional array of boolean values that stores the state of each grid cell (false for empty; true for filled). The array is indexed using (row-major ordering)Methods of the class are used to calculate the nonogram numbers and save them to text files.
Version:
0.1
Author:
Joshua Wiseman

    • NonogramMakerModel

      public NonogramMakerModel(int numRows, int numCols)
      Creates a 1D boolean array with the given number of rows and columns. With R rows and C columns.
      Parameters:
      numRows - Number of rows which the grid is going to contain.
      numCols - Number of columns which the grid is going to contain.

    • NonogramMakerModel

      public NonogramMakerModel(File file) throws IOException
      Constructs a NonogramMakerModel by reading in data from a file. Reads data to populate the grid array.
      Parameters:
      file - The file which contains the data necessary to make a Nonogram.
      Throws:
      IOException - Throws this exception if the file is not found.

    • NonogramMakerModel

      Parameters:
      filename - The file location which contains the data necessary to make a Nonogram.
      Throws:
      IOException - Throws this exception if the file is not found.
